member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.CachingSitecoreServicesConfigurationExtensions.Caching(Sitecore.Framework.Configuration.ISitecoreServicesConfiguration,System.Action{Sitecore.Framework.Caching.SitecoreCachingConfigBuilder})
member.summary: Adds the Sitecore caching system to the service collection. Only to be called once per application. This function will setup a cache memory provider that will be used by all caches (by default) unless they are configured to use other providers.
